info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

get.description: Lists ExpressRoute gateways under a given subscription.
Lists all the VirtualWANs in a subscription.
Lists ExpressRoute gateways in a given resource group.
Fetches the details of a ExpressRoute gateway in a resource group.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

put.description: Creates or updates a ExpressRoute gateway in a specified resource group.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

parameters.name: putExpressRouteGatewayParameters
parameters.description: Parameters required in an ExpressRoute gateway PUT operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update a virtual wan express route gateway tags.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description: Deletes the specified ExpressRoute gateway in a resource group. An ExpressRoute gateway resource can only be deleted when there are no connection subresources.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the express route gateway.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the express route connection.

put.description: Creates a connection between an ExpressRoute gateway and an ExpressRoute circuit.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the express route gateway.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the express route connection.

parameters.name: putExpressRouteConnectionParameters
parameters.description: Parameters required in an ExpressRouteConnection PUT operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description: Deletes a connection to a ExpressRoute circuit.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the express route gateway.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the express route connection.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.description: Lists all the VirtualWANs in a resource group.
Retrieves the details of a VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being retrieved.

put.description: Creates a VirtualWAN resource if it doesn't exist else updates the existing VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being retrieved.

parameters.name: WANParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update VirtualWAN.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being retrieved.

parameters.name: WANParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to Update VirtualWAN tags.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being retrieved.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Generates a unique VPN profile for P2S clients for VirtualWan and associated VpnServerConfiguration combination in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: virtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: vpnClientParams
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the generate VirtualWan VPN profile generation operation.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Gives the supported security providers for the virtual wan.

parameters.name: virtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN.

post.description: Gives the sas-url to download the configurations for vpn-sites in a resource group.

parameters.name: virtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to download vpn-sites configuration.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

post.description: Gives the list of VpnServerConfigurations associated with Virtual Wan in a resource group.

AadAuthenticationParameters.description: AAD Vpn authentication type related parameters.

aadTenant.description: AAD Vpn authentication parameter AAD tenant.

aadAudience.description: AAD Vpn authentication parameter AAD audience.

aadIssuer.description: AAD Vpn authentication parameter AAD issuer.

Action.description: Action to be taken on a route matching a RouteMap criterion.

type.description: Type of action to be taken. Supported types are 'Remove', 'Add', 'Replace', and 'Drop.'

parameters.description: List of parameters relevant to the action.For instance if type is drop then parameters has list of prefixes to be dropped.If type is add, parameters would have list of ASN numbers to be added

properties.description: The properties of the Bgp connections.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

hubVirtualNetworkConnection.description: The reference to the HubVirtualNetworkConnection resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

connectionState.description: The current state of the VirtualHub to Peer.

Criterion.description: A matching criteria which matches routes based on route prefix, community, and AS path.

routePrefix.description: List of route prefixes which this criteria matches.

community.description: List of BGP communities which this criteria matches.

asPath.description: List of AS paths which this criteria matches.

matchCondition.description: Match condition to apply RouteMap rules.

DeviceProperties.description: List of properties of the device.

EffectiveRouteMapRoute.description: The effective RouteMap route configured on the connection resource.

prefix.description: The address prefix of the route.

value.description: The list of Effective RouteMap Routes configured on the connection resource.

EffectiveRoutesParameters.description: The parameters specifying the resource whose effective routes are being requested.

resourceId.description: The resource whose effective routes are being requested.

virtualWanResourceType.description: The type of the specified resource like RouteTable, ExpressRouteConnection, HubVirtualNetworkConnection, VpnConnection and P2SConnection.

id.description: The ID of the ExpressRoute circuit peering.

properties.description: Properties of the express route connection.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the express route connection resource.

authorizationKey.description: Authorization key to establish the connection.

routingWeight.description: The routing weight associated to the connection.

expressRouteGatewayBypass.description: Enable FastPath to vWan Firewall hub.

enablePrivateLinkFastPath.description: Bypass the ExpressRoute gateway when accessing private-links. ExpressRoute FastPath (expressRouteGatewayBypass) must be enabled.

routingConfiguration.description: The Routing Configuration indicating the associated and propagated route tables on this connection.

properties.description: Properties of the express route gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

expressRouteConnections.description: List of ExpressRoute connections to the ExpressRoute gateway.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the express route gateway resource.

virtualHub.description: The Virtual Hub where the ExpressRoute gateway is or will be deployed.

allowNonVirtualWanTraffic.description: Configures this gateway to accept traffic from non Virtual WAN networks.

GetInboundRoutesParameters.description: The parameters specifying the connection resource whose inbound routes are being requested.

resourceUri.description: The connection resource whose inbound routes are being requested.

connectionType.description: The type of the specified connection resource like ExpressRouteConnection, HubVirtualNetworkConnection, VpnConnection and P2SConnection.

GetOutboundRoutesParameters.description: The parameters specifying the connection resource whose outbound routes are being requested.

resourceUri.description: The connection resource whose outbound routes are being requested.

connectionType.description: The type of the specified connection resource like ExpressRouteConnection, HubVirtualNetworkConnection, VpnConnection and P2SConnection.

vpnSites.description: List of resource-ids of the vpn-sites for which config is to be downloaded.

outputBlobSasUrl.description: The sas-url to download the configurations for vpn-sites.

privateIPAddress.description: The private IP address of the IP configuration.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: The private IP address allocation method.

subnet.description: The reference to the subnet resource.

publicIPAddress.description: The reference to the public IP resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the IP configuration resource.

properties.description: The properties of the Virtual Hub IPConfigurations.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

name.description: The name of the Route that is unique within a RouteTable. This name can be used to access this route.

destinationType.description: The type of destinations (eg: CIDR, ResourceId, Service).

nextHopType.description: The type of next hop (eg: ResourceId).

HubRouteTable.description: RouteTable resource in a virtual hub.

properties.description: Properties of the RouteTable resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

labels.description: List of labels associated with this route table.

associatedConnections.description: List of all connections associated with this route table.

propagatingConnections.description: List of all connections that advertise to this route table.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the RouteTable resource.

properties.description: Properties of the hub virtual network connection.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

remoteVirtualNetwork.description: Reference to the remote virtual network.

allowHubToRemoteVnetTransit.description: Deprecated: VirtualHub to RemoteVnet transit to enabled or not.

allowRemoteVnetToUseHubVnetGateways.description: Deprecated: Allow RemoteVnet to use Virtual Hub's gateways.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the hub virtual network connection resource.

ListHubRouteTablesResult.description: List of RouteTables and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The HubRouteTable items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListP2SVpnGatewaysResult.description: Result of the request to list P2SVpnGateways. It contains a list of P2SVpnGateways and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The P2SVpnGateway items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListRouteMapsResult.description: List of RouteMaps and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The RouteMap items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The VirtualHub items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListVirtualWANsResult.description: Result of the request to list VirtualWANs. It contains a list of VirtualWANs and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The VirtualWAN items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListVpnConnectionsResult.description: Result of the request to list all vpn connections to a virtual wan vpn gateway. It contains a list of Vpn Connections and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The VpnConnection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListVpnGatewayNatRulesResult.description: Result of the request to list all nat rules to a virtual wan vpn gateway. It contains a list of Nat rules and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The VpnGatewayNatRule items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListVpnGatewaysResult.description: Result of the request to list VpnGateways. It contains a list of VpnGateways and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The VpnGateway items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListVpnSiteLinksResult.description: Result of the request to list VpnSiteLinks. It contains a list of VpnSiteLinks and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The VpnSiteLink items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ListVpnSitesResult.description: Result of the request to list VpnSites. It contains a list of VpnSites and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.description: The VpnSite items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

rules.description: List of RouteMap rules to be applied.
